Marah Louw, nke a makwaara dị ka Marah Louw Thompson  ma ọ bụ Mara Louw, bụ onye South Africa na-abụ abụ, onye na-ede egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri. A mụrụ ya n'abali iri na asaa nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1952 na mpaghara Mzimhlophe na Soweto, South Africa.

Ọ malitere isonye  otu ukwe mgbe ọ dị afọ iri n'oge ọ gara Japan, Hong Kong, Philippines, South Africa na United Kingdom. Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọ gara Zambia, Botswana, Zimbabwe, Lesotho, Swaziland na Namibia dị ka onye na-eti egwu

Louw gụrụ egwu ncheta ọmụmụ nke Nelson Mandela na 1988 bụ Nelson Mandela 70th Birthday Tribute concert na Wembley Stadium, London iji kwado ọgụ megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ. Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na usoro telivishọn nke South Africa  bụ The Queen ebe omere ngosi agwa ihe nkiri dị ka Boi Maake ruo mgbe ọ hapụrụ ihe ngosi ahụ na 2017. Ọ bụkwa onye ọka ikpe na oge nke abụọ nke Idols South Africa
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2021 Louw gosipụtara Kọmitii ndị omeiwu South Africa na-ahụ maka ahia na ụlọ ọrụ iji kwado mgbanwe nwebisiinka na ikike ichi isi nke ndị na-eme ihe omume.
